para.text: Auxiliary DC output, simulate the battery supply.
See: Auxiliary DC Source (Battery Simulator) of hardware instructions.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Once AuxDC start output, on startup page and status bar of all test modules will showing the AuxDC as Green color.
